page.title: 07Social activities
page.content: Most of the social activities of the parish centre around the church.The following organisations currently exist. 1.The Church Social Committee.The committee organises whist drives, social evenings,concerts given by visiting choirs and most importantly, the annual fete and horticultural show.This event is a valuable money raiser for the church,last August's fete raised Â£1,500. 2.The Mothers' Union. This organisation,whose aim is to "uphold the sanctity of married life," meets once a month at the Church Hall. Guests are brought in from neighbouring parishes to speak on various religious and domestic topics.
